de.hunsicker.jalopy.language.antlr

Class JavaNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • antlr.BaseAST
      • antlr.CommonAST
        • antlr.CommonASTWithHiddenTokens
          • de.hunsicker.jalopy.language.antlr.Node
            • de.hunsicker.jalopy.language.antlr.JavaNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    antlr.collections.AST, Serializable, Comparable

    public abstract class JavaNode
extends Node
    A node representing an element in a Java source file.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.2 $
    Author:
    Marco Hunsicker
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
